EmailTemplate.name: Validation - Property Owner Mismatch
EmailTemplate.subject: Lease Contract Validation - {!Account.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case Number: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Hi {!Account.Account_Owner__c},
We are in the process of verifying the registered ownership of the above lease agreement. Based upon information from our Title search and address verification report, {!Account.Name} is not the owner of the property. We found out that {PROPERTY OWNER in RQ} appears to be the owner of the property located at {!Account.BillingAddress}.
Please be advised that we do Title Searching as a pre – countersignature requirement to ensure that our applicants are the owner of the property, as such, we can avoid problem/s dealing with Public Utilities Commission (PUC) & Uniform Commercial Code (UCC) Filing. Property ownership is a requirement to participate in our leasing program.
We request you to send us a copy of any of the below documents that would reflect the property ownership of the customer.
• Notarized / County recorded Deed
• HUD Settlement Statement
If the Property is under a TRUST, we opt to require a Grant Deed/Deed of Trust stating the LESSEE as the Grantee or the Beneficiary of the Trust.
Should you have questions, please let us know.
Thanks, {!Case.OwnerFullName}| Analyst, Financial Products Originations SunPower | PO BOX 82387, Austin, TX 78708-2387 | Office 1-800-786-7693 | Fax 1-512-684-0288 |{!Case.OwnerEmail}
